text: فما له من قوة ولا ناصر

translations.translation: and man will have no strength or helper.
He will have no strength or helper.
he shall have no power, and no helper.
he will have no power, nor anyone to help him.
So man will neither have any strength nor any aide.
Then he will have no power, nor any helper.
He shall have neither strength nor helper.
and he shall have no strength, no helper.
Then will he have no might nor any helper.
[man] will have no power, and no helper.
Then he shall have no power nor any helper.
and he shall have neither power nor helper.
(Man) will have no power, and no helper.
Then will (man) have no power, nor any helper.
when he will be helpless, with no supporter.
He will have no strength, and no supporter.
Then man will have no power or any helper.
[86:10] whereat he, the one who denies resurrection, will have neither strength, to defend himself against chastisement, nor any helper, to avert it from him.
(Then will he) Abu Talib (have no might) to defend himself (nor any helper) to shield him from Allah's chastisement.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
{ فَمَا لَهُ } أي: للإنسان حينئذٍ { مِن قُوَّةٍ } يدفع عن نفسه ما يترتب على أعماله وأحواله من العذاب والعقاب على وجه الجزاء { وَلاَ نَاصِرٍ } [الطارق: 10] يدفعه عنه وينصره
 إذ كل نفس يومئذٍ رهينة بما كسبت
 مشغولة بجزاء ما جرت خيراً كان أو شراً
